title: SEA Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster
text: 1 a : a great body of salt water that covers much of the earth broadly : the waters of the earth as distinguished from the land and air b : a body of salt water of second rank more or less landlocked the Mediterranean sea c : ocean d : an inland body of water —used especially for names of such bodies the Caspian Sea 2 a : surface motion on a large body of water or its direction also : a large swell or wave —often used in plural heavy seas b : the disturbance of the ocean or other body of water due to the wind 3 : something likened to the sea especially in vastness a sea of faces 4 : the seafaring life 5 sea adjective Love words? Need even more definitions? Merriam-Webster unabridged
